last_episode_to_air.name: May 15th, 1982
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Spoiler and Al Madril unite to challenge King Kong Bundy and Bugsy McGraw for the American Tag Team Championship in the main event. Texas Heavyweight Champion Wild Bill Irwin goes one-on-one with Rick Harris. Plus, Frank Dusek in action, Ken Mantell battles The Magic Dragon, and more!

name: World Class Championship Wrestling
overview: Fritz Von Erich presents World Class Championship Wrestling from deep in the heart of Texas!
